title: BRIEF-GE Announces An Order For A Multiyear Services Agreement With Sappi (Sappi Austria Produktions–GmbH & Co KG)
text:
BRIEF-GE Announces An Order For A Multiyear Services Agreement With Sappi (Sappi Austria Produktions–GmbH & Co KG)

Stock Markets 34 minutes ago (Oct 17, 2019 12:00)

© Reuters. BRIEF-GE Announces An Order For A Multiyear Services Agreement With Sappi (Sappi Austria Produktions–GmbH & Co KG) Oct 17 (Reuters) - General Electric (NYSE: ) Co GE.N : * GE - ANNOUNCED AN ORDER FOR A MULTIYEAR SERVICES AGREEMENT WITH SAPPI (SAPPI AUSTRIA PRODUKTIONS–GMBH & CO KG) * GE - WILL PROVIDE LONG-TERM MAINTENANCE SERVICES & PERFORMANCE UPGRADES ON A 42-MW GAS TURBINE SUPPLIED BY ANOTHER EQUIPMENT MANUFACTURER

BRIEF-GE Announces An Order For A Multiyear Services Agreement With Sappi (Sappi Austria Produktions–GmbH & Co KG)
